snippet: Wil Myers, last year’s American League rookie of the year, left the Tampa Bay Rays’ game against the Pittsburgh Pirates in the third inning with a bruised right quadriceps.
abstract: Tampa Bay Rays outfielder Wil Myers injures his leg during spring training game against the Pittsburgh Pirates; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Wil Myers, last year’s American League rookie of the year, left the Tampa Bay Rays’ game against the Pittsburgh Pirates in the third inning with a bruised right quadriceps.
